attributes.review: This app took all my WiFi and stole my information now I don’t feel safe. I would really like to get my information back.

attributes.review: I’d give zero stars if I could. This app will steal your wife and kids and then laugh about it while you’re sitting and weeping. Overall, awful app. Do not recommend.

attributes.review: Seconds after downloading the trump app my Dino nuggies disappeared from my fridge. Since downloading the trump app was the only thing I have done all day the Dino nugget mystery was only caused by one thing.

attributes.review: They said they wanted all my food and that they would take away my fridge I found that really disturbing that someone would say that to me.

attributes.review: Literally the worst app ever 🥰 I downloaded it and immediately my phone exploded and hit my brother’s foot really hard and had to get his foot amputated. I want a refund for my phone and my brother’s foot! 🦶
